content.description:
Et haec1 quidem affirmantibus credo; illud affirmare aliis 
possum. Est libertus mihi non illitteratusillitteratus, -a, -um, adj.: uneducated. Cum hoc minor 
frater eodem lecto quiescebat.
 1:Haec refers to two stories, which Pliny has just told.↩
content.question: In line 2, what does libertus mean?

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
